name: Pugna Porcorum
tagline: Transcription and Translation of 1530 Latin Poem, "The Battle of the Pigs"
body:
![Title Page from 1530 Edition of Pugna Porcorum](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GitClassics/PugnaPorcorum/master/Images/1530TitlePage.jpg)

For reference, you might want to look at the [1830 edition of the _Pugna Porcorum_](https://github.com/GitClassics/PugnaPorcorum/master/PugnaPorcocum.pdf) from which this transcription was made.

## Latin Text of _Pugna Porcorum_
* Prefatory Material
  * [Lectori Benevolo](https://github.com/GitClassics/PugnaPorcorum/blob/master/Latin/Prefatory/LectoriBenevolo.md)
  * [Proditur Poeta](https://github.com/GitClassics/PugnaPorcorum/blob/master/Latin/Prefatory/ProditurPoeta.md)
* [_Pugna Porcorum_](https://github.com/GitClassics/PugnaPorcorum/blob/master/Latin/Pugna/Pugna.md)
* [Placentius](https://github.com/GitClassics/PugnaPorcorum/blob/master/Latin/Placentius/Placentius.md)
* [Praecatiuncula](https://github.com/GitClassics/PugnaPorcorum/blob/master/Latin/Praecatiuncula/Praecatiuncula.md)

## English Translation of _Pugna Porcorum_
* Coming soon! Get in touch at [GitClassics](http://gitclassics.github.io) to help!

![Frontispiece from 1830 Edition of Pugna Porcorum](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GitClassics/PugnaPorcorum/master/Images/Frontispiece.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
